name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.9-2ec69a4fb03f938f6fa785c6b6656492515e2e53 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
